##Dependencies

- [React.js](https://github.com/facebook/react)
- [X-Tag core](https://github.com/x-tag/core)
- [es5-shim](https://github.com/es-shims/es5-shim)
- [xblocks-core](https://github.com/Katochimoto/xblocks-core)

##Install

```
npm install xblocks
```
```
bower install xblocks
```
